name: Flappy Monky
description:
Welcome to Flappy Monky! Click the white square button to make your Monky flap and avoid the obstacles! Can you reach the highest hiscores of them all? 

On PC use either mouse click or space to flap :)

This is my first game ever (yes i followed a tutorial) so i am very excited that everything (hopefully) works. This is a very very VERY super extra early prototype. In the future, once i'm better at programming, i might add more stuff like leaderboard, collectable coins, different Monky's, etc. But for now, i'll go and study so i can make better games without following any tutorials. Thank you for reading and downloading (if you did) :)

Funee Monkee, lovbl i luv funee monkee.
